website_summaries.verdict: The $180 Dell Inspiron 11 (3162) is a competent performer with all the basic features and functionality you want in a budget ultraportable laptop, plus 64-bit Windows 10, long battery life, and a sturdy build.
cons: Bold blue color will likely be divisive
Middling display with poor viewing angles

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's not bad though.
customer_reviews.text: Works okay as a tablet. It's a little slow loading up and just generally at times and I had to download google chrome as internet explorer just kept crashing. For the price it's not bad though.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Rees

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Insufficient memory. Once operating system is loaded there is little left for anything else. Not expandable!
customer_reviews.author: MR JPK

customer_reviews.title: But this has proved useful for its intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: I cannot comment on a Dell computer as an HP computer was supplied. But this has proved useful for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Really good value. My 11 year old loved getting this for Christmas. Seems to do everything she wants it to. We got Microsoft office 2016 for it and it went on no problem.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: ... months ago and it has stopped working not very good at
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a few months ago and it has stopped working not very good at all
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was chuffed to bits, especially as it can work as a touch screen and tablet
customer_reviews.author: oxmum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift. Does exactly what was expected. Very light and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hughes

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the worst laptops I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst laptops I have ever had. It always take so long to open anything! I have had this laptop for a few weeks now and I had my fingers crossed that it would get better with time but it has not. I have downloaded the Netflix app and it wont even let me open it. It takes 10 minutes to open internet explorer. The mouse pad is slow and rarely does what you are trying to do. When I bought this laptop I was very excited as I had read most of the reviews online before buying it but, I would not recommend this laptop to anyone. Sorry DELL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: The unit had several issues. It did not have enough memory to carry out even the basic necessary update required. It kept freezing and shutting itself down. I have decided to return it and haveI tried to reset the unit back to factory settings, it's been stuck on 60% for the last 3 hours. Tried to reset manually and just keeps going through a loop trying to reset. Giving up! Best thing about it is the colour!
customer_reviews.author: Reeta

customer_reviews.title: Worse than useless
customer_reviews.text: Worse than useless, patching and updates immediately after purchase consumed virtually all the memory. I'm writing this on my last 32MB, I'll probably recycle my 11 3000 tomorrow and never ever buy Dell again.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

product_meta.title: Dell Inspiron 11 3000 Series 11.6 inch Touchscreen Convertible Laptop (Intel Celeron N3060, 2 GB RAM, 32 GB eMMC, HD) - Blue
product_meta.description:
Dell Inspiron 11 3000 Series 11.6 inch Touchscreen Convertible Laptop (Intel Celeron N3060, 2 GB RAM, 32 GB eMMC, HD) - Blue.

BOX CONTAINS
Inspiron 11-3000 series 2-in-1
UK power cord
AC adaptor
shipping material
feature_bullets: Colourful, lightweight and highly versatile with four head-turning modes to travel with you anywhere
Makes bold moves: An enhanced 360 degrees hinge supports four different modes
Goes anywhere you do: Slim and trim at under 21 mm, this compact 11 inch 2-in-1 makes the ideal companion to your everyday adventures
Built for adventure: The compact size and long battery life are ideal for mobile media and the lightweight body will never weigh you down
The power to keep up: With the latest Intel Celeron processor you’ll have performance for your everyday activities

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars14 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
